unnormalised: Arre yaar, hea recipe-ak 250 gms maida ani 150 ml doodh zai mhunta. Konn maptalea tea bhaxen? Mhoji aai mat mhunta "andaaz se," mhunnje sumaar 1 cup pito ani "thoda sa" dudh. Nimnne utponn vo bhov borem zata vo ekdom nikaam'mi zata, punn hey, ti Indian randpachi moj, sori? Zaite mhunnon hanga ami thodi halad mista shub shukrachem, mhunn ithen suchona na zaitori. ðŸ˜œ
normalised: Arey yaar, hea recipe-khatir donso panchhis gram maida ani deaddhso millimeter doodh zai mhanta. Konn maptol hea bhaxen? Mhoji mai fakt "andaaz se" ghalta, je eka cup-anxim pitth ani "thoda sa" dudh asta. Nimannem jevonn ekdom borem zata vo purnn fop, punn hey, tea-ich maza asa Bharatiya jevnnant, sorem? Kiteak mhaka bhagiek ek chimut haldi ghalunk zainam, torui te suchonavallint na. winking face
text: Arre yaar, hea recipe-ak 250 gms maida ani 150 ml doodh zai mhunta. Konn maptalea tea bhaxen? Mhoji aai mat mhunta "andaaz se," mhunnje sumaar 1 cup pito ani "thoda sa" dudh. Nimnne utponn vo bhov borem zata vo ekdom nikaam'mi zata, punn hey, ti Indian randpachi moj, sori? Zaite mhunnon hanga ami thodi halad mista shub shukrachem, mhunn ithen suchona na zaitori. ðŸ˜œ
